```bash
scp ./images/thao.jpg cce@192.168.1.202:/mnt/hdd_2TB/data/thao.jpg
sudo mv /mnt/hdd_2TB/data/thao.jpg /mnt/hdd_2TB/data/f4r/service/images/thao.jpg
# /app/f4r/images/thao.jpg : Thảo Nguyễn

scp ./images/face1.jpg cce@192.168.1.202:/mnt/hdd_2TB/data/face1.jpg
sudo mv /mnt/hdd_2TB/data/face1.jpg /mnt/hdd_2TB/data/f4r/service/images/face1.jpg
# /app/f4r/images/face1.jpg : Hà Lê

scp ./images/face2.jpg cce@192.168.1.202:/mnt/hdd_2TB/data/face2.jpg

# /app/f4r/images/face2.jpg : Linh Huỳnh
```

Command to copy images from remote server:

```bash
# copy from ftp server
scp -r cce@192.168.1.202:/mnt/hdd_2TB/thien/tris-face/ftp/data/C__ROOT__dien_toan_group_1__cong_2/2025/10/14/08/ ./images

# copy from user images
scp -r cce@192.168.1.202:/mnt/hdd_2TB/thien/tris-face/backend-face/data/images/customer-imgs/ ./images
scp -r cce@192.168.1.202:/mnt/hdd_2TB/thien/tris-face/backend-face/data/images/personal-imgs/ ./images
```
